name: Lily's Dream Land
description:
Welcome to the dream land.

Lily's turning four today, and she couldn't be more excited. But on her way to the party, she takes a rather unexpected detour into the dream land, a place where the desires of one can be fully explored.

Can you make it out of the dream land and to the party safely?

This game was created for RMN's 1.44 Floppy Disk event. Wherein I had to create a game that could fit on a floppy disk. I decided to use GB Studio for this event, and ended up with a game that took up about a megabyte of space.

Sorry for those who wanted more by the way. I couldn't really make the game much bigger without going over the limit...

Known Bugs
- Sometimes, certain objects up and leave for no reason. Even worse, one of these objects is a platform required for progress in one of the levels...
There's no fix available sadly. I'm at the mercy of the GB Studio engine...
